Description: The following statement contains a magic number: await RequestTimeout(context' TimeSpan.FromDays(7)' message)                  .ConfigureAwait(false);

The following statement contains a magic number: Test.Saga<MySaga>()                  .ExpectReplyToOriginator<MyResponse>()                  .ExpectTimeoutToBeSetIn<StartsSaga>(                      check: (state' span) =>                      {                          return span == TimeSpan.FromDays(7);                      })                  .ExpectPublish<MyEvent>()                  .ExpectSend<MyCommand>()                  .When(                      sagaIsInvoked: (saga' context) =>                      {                          return saga.Handle(new StartsSaga()' context);                      })                  .ExpectPublish<MyOtherEvent>()                  .WhenSagaTimesOut()                  .AssertSagaCompletionIs(true);

The following statement contains a magic number: Test.Saga<MySaga>()                  .ExpectReplyToOriginator<MyResponse>()                  .ExpectTimeoutToBeSetIn<StartsSaga>(                      check: (state' span) =>                      {                          return span == TimeSpan.FromDays(7);                      })                  .ExpectPublish<MyEvent>()                  .ExpectSend<MyCommand>()                  #region 5to6-usingWhen                    .When(                      sagaIsInvoked: (saga' context) =>                      {                          return saga.Handle(new StartsSaga()' context);                      })                  #endregion                    .ExpectPublish<MyEvent>()                  .WhenSagaTimesOut()                  .AssertSagaCompletionIs(true);

The following statement contains a magic number: Test.Saga<MySaga>()                  .ExpectReplyToOriginator<MyResponse>()                  .ExpectTimeoutToBeSetIn<StartsSaga>(                      check: (state' span) =>                      {                          return span == TimeSpan.FromDays(7);                      })                  .ExpectPublish<MyEvent>()                  .ExpectSend<MyCommand>()                  #region 5to6-usingNewOverload                    .When(                      handlerSelector: saga =>                      {                          return saga.Handle;                      }'                      message: new StartsSaga())                  #endregion                    .ExpectPublish<MyEvent>()                  .WhenSagaTimesOut()                  .AssertSagaCompletionIs(true);
